Statement.Sql: select v.*,f.mName,f.mType,f.mProperties,g.mDisplay,g.mSort,g.mGroup,g.mFieldId as mFId from FIELD_VALUE v, FIELD f, FIELD_GROUP g where f.mId=v.mFieldId and f.mId=g.mFieldId and mTable=? and mKey=? order by v.mCreated desc

select v.*,f.mName,f.mType,f.mProperties,g.mDisplay,g.mSort,g.mGroup,g.mFieldId as mFId from FIELD_VALUE v, FIELD f, FIELD_GROUP g where f.mId=v.mFieldId and f.mId=g.mFieldId and mTable=? and mKey=? and v.mFieldId=? order by v.mCreated desc

select v.*,f.mName,f.mType,f.mProperties,g.mDisplay,g.mSort,g.mGroup,g.mFieldId as mFId from FIELD_GROUP g left join FIELD_VALUE v on g.mFieldId=v.mFieldId and v.mTable=? and v.mKey=? and v.mId IN (select max(mId) from FIELD_VALUE group by mKey,mFieldId) left join FIELD f on g.mFieldId=f.mId where g.mGroup=?
